extendedInfo.description: Galatta.com, the complete movie portal that provides you with unparalleled entertainment on the latest in movies, music, movie stars and much more in the Indian cine world, takes up a new avatar to offer you the latest cine news and highlights!!Galatta News, a handy app that is setting new trends, has been designed to provide you with breaking news in Indian cinema. It gives you quick and easy access to the latest updates about your favorite movies and celebrities, press releases and much more.FeaturesLatest cine news at your finger tipsBehind the scenes breaking news with stunning imagesStay updated with news from Hollywood and the Tamil, Telugu, Malayalam, Kannada and Hindi cine industriesSave news items to read at your leisureShare news stories via email, Facebook or TwitterSearch for your Favorite newsEasy-to-use interfaceBe the first to get updated with the latest happenings in the cinema world on the go. Get to know the most recent news in Hollywood and the Tamil, Telugu, Malayalam, Kannada and Hindi movie industries and share it with your friends via email, Facebook and Twitter. A single tap is all that is required to search for news and save your favorite news items.Moreover, Galatta News offers a great reading experience with its stylish glossy interface. The dashing photographs that accompany every news story will definitely be a visual treat for your eyes. The clear-cut navigational controls ensure convenient and easy reading.So, what are you waiting for? Download Galatta News now and stay updated with the latest cine news and celebrity stories!

reviews.title: Great Cine news app!
reviews.comment: Yay..finally got the app that I\'m looking for. News are updated here quicker than any other sources. Sharing the news via Twitter and Facebook is the additional bonus. Must have if you are Cine lover :-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Poor updating
reviews.comment: U come back after 72 hours to check on updates,  u ll find the same thing u read 3 to 4 days ago on every language... no gud updates... the admin does it as per his/her/their feasibility and interests. U can\'t organize the languages as per ur interests. News s mostly related to bad gossips.... cud concentrate more on real updates for cinema lovers...
reviews.author: anitha sivaraman

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: The app UI is great. It will be good if you add other features in app which is available in the Galatta website.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome app
reviews.comment: Now I can check the latest cine news updates in my device itself. But, not able to move this app to SD card.. Hope this will be available in the next version!

reviews.title: Good App
reviews.comment: I normally checked the latest cine happenings through Galatta website. Now, they have release the Galatta news app for Android devices which is a very good news to check the updates on the go.   I found the following features to be noted in this app 1.User friendly navigation 2.Easy to share the article for my Twitter and Facebook friends.  3.I can able to save my favorite news
